椳字的基本解释

椳
wēi
门臼，承托门转轴的臼状物。

椳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēi］
［《廣韻》烏恢切，平灰，影。］
(1)承托门轴的门臼。
(2)见“椳際”。

椳字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　椳； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页537第21
【唐韻】【正韻】烏恢切【集韻】烏回切，?音隈。【說文】門樞也。【爾雅·釋宮】樞謂之椳。【疏】門持樞者。　又【集韻】【正韻】?烏賄切，音猥。義同。

椳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
椳字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
wēi
Door mortar, a mortar that supports the shaft of the door.
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēi］
["Guang Yun" Wu Hui cut, flat gray, shadow. ]
(1) A door socket that supports the door shaft.
(2) See "Linji".
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　椳; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 537 21
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Wu Hui cut [Ji Yun] Wu Hui cut,? Yin Kuma. [Said the text] The door hinge is also. 【Erya·Shigong】shu is said to be the hoard. [Sparse] Door holders.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Wu bribe cut, sound awkward. The same meaning.
